001package org.nasdanika.emf.persistence;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.io.OutputStream;
006import java.net.URLDecoder;
007import java.net.URLEncoder;
008import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
009import java.util.Map;
010
011import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
012import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
013import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource;
014import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceFactoryImpl;
015import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceImpl;
016import org.nasdanika.common.DefaultConverter;
017import org.nasdanika.common.URIEncodable;
018import org.nasdanika.ncore.NcoreFactory;
019
020/**
021 * Loads text files as resources with a single {@link org.nasdanika.ncore.String} object.
022 * @author Pavel
023 */
024public class TextResourceFactory extends ResourceFactoryImpl {
025        
026        private class TextResource extends ResourceImpl implements URIEncodable {
027                
028                TextResource(URI uri) {
029                        super(uri);
030                }
031                
032                @Override
033                public void load(java.util.Map<?,?> options) throws IOException {
034                        if (isDataURI(getURI())) {
035                                String uriStr = getURI().toString();
036                                uriStr = uriStr.substring("data:text,".length());                               
037                                uriStr = URLDecoder.decode(uriStr, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
038                                org.nasdanika.ncore.String str = NcoreFactory.eINSTANCE.createString();
039                                str.setValue(uriStr);
040                                getContents().clear();
041                                getContents().add(str);
042                        } else {
043                                super.load(options);
044                        }                       
045                }
046                
047                @Override
048                protected void doLoad(InputStream inputStream, Map<?, ?> options) throws IOException {
049                        String text = DefaultConverter.INSTANCE.toString(inputStream);
050                        org.nasdanika.ncore.String str = NcoreFactory.eINSTANCE.createString();
051                        str.setValue(text);
052                        getContents().clear();
053                        getContents().add(str);
054                }
055
056                @Override
057                public URI encode() {
058                        StringBuilder payloadBuilder = new StringBuilder();
059                        for (EObject eObj: getContents()) {
060                                if (eObj instanceof org.nasdanika.ncore.String) {
061                                        String text = ((org.nasdanika.ncore.String) eObj).getValue();
062                                        if (text != null) {
063                                                payloadBuilder.append(text);
064                                        }
065                                } else {
066                                        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Unsupported contents: " + eObj);
067                                }
068                        }
069                        String uriStr = "data:text," + URLEncoder.encode(payloadBuilder.toString(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
070                        return URI.createURI(uriStr);
071                }
072
073                @Override
074                protected void doSave(OutputStream outputStream, Map<?, ?> options) throws IOException {
075                        try {
076                                for (EObject eObj: getContents()) {
077                                        if (eObj instanceof org.nasdanika.ncore.String) {
078                                                String text = ((org.nasdanika.ncore.String) eObj).getValue();
079                                                if (text != null) {
080                                                        outputStream.write(text.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
081                                                }
082                                        } else {
083                                                throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Unsupported contents: " + eObj);
084                                        }
085                                }
086                        } finally {
087                                outputStream.close();
088                        }
089                }
090                
091        }
092        
093        @Override
094        public Resource createResource(URI uri) {
095                return new TextResource(uri);
096        }
097        
098        /**
099         * @param uri
100         * @return true if the argument URI is drawio data URI, i.e. is starts with data:drawio[;base64],
101         */
102        public static boolean isDataURI(URI uri) {
103                return uri != null && "data".equals(uri.scheme()) && uri.toString().startsWith("data:text,");
104        }       
105
106}
